item.description: Its FINALLY HERE!!!!! The biggest Indian New Year Eve party in all of New England! NEW YEAR's EVE BASH with live DIN CHECK Bollywood band, DJ, lavish food, drinks, and dance floor! Come celebrate New Year 2012 in style! Hosted by India Association of Rhode Island, the event is held on New Year's Eve at Hotel Crown Plaza in Providence/Warwick, Rhode Island. Adults $40, Students $20, Kids under 2 free! LIMITED SEATS only...advance reservations highly recommended: Call 401-295-4290 or online athttp://www.indiari.org/events.html
item.name: NEW YEAR BASH - live Bollywood band, DJ, Dinner, Drinks & Dance Floor!
